How about this:

After leaving Earth Optimus Primal and his grou unknowingly went 300 
years into the future of there original time.  We send some chars to 
Cybertron only a year or two after their original time, to find that a 
giant metor had devestated the planet leaving only small groups of 
transformers no more than two or three hundred per group. That way it 
won't matter what the capital city was called, we won't denig BM, and 
we can still get plenty of new chars out of the small groups (not to 
mention we'll have alot of work to do to get the planet ready for BM 
to happen in 300 years cities to build and everything its just I'm 
planning to bring in a char from the future and he revolves around the 
fact that BM DID happen). Furthermore I still say we need a seperate 
OOC message board.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> no.. your wrong
